products.title: Spirit Navy Venetian Blind - 25mm Slat
products.metadescription: Dark as the night but with a sleek, glossy finish, the spirit navy aluminium venetian blind is classy and perfect for the contemporary home.   The aluminium slats are incredibly hard wearing, so this blind is perfect for the kitchen or bathroom where you can incorporate it into

products.title: Spirit Pastel Blue Venetian Blind - 25mm Slat
products.metadescription: This spirit baby blue aluminium venetian blind is perfect for the little one's room or, when mixed with the right colours and textures, it would even make a lovely addition to a more mature and refined setting.   Try teaming with whites, silvers and even a dash of bright pastels

products.title: Spirit Surf Blue Venetian Blind - 25mm Slat
products.metadescription: Surf's up! Grab your spirit surf blue aluminium venetian blind and get those summer feelings ready.   This bright and breezy colour is calming and joyous to look at and will give your room that real tropical feel. The strong aluminium slats would look great in a bathroom, bedroom
